"Resolution: 1920 x 800" isn't it suppose to be 1080?

1) Armed man 7; it's 2.35 aspect-ratio wide-screen film; you only get 1080 vertical at 1920 horizontal if the AR is 17/9 or 1.777.

2) Video quality 7; obvious blocking and banding artifacts in dark areas.
